alert.note: Alert for Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 13 at 7:52AM CST until December 13 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN TARRANT COUNTY... At 752 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Pelican Bay, or over Azle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Eagle Mountain around 755 AM CST. Pecan Acres around 800 AM CST. Saginaw around 805 AM CST. Haslet around 810 AM CST. Keller and Roanoke around 825 AM CST. Southlake around 830 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Westlake, Newark and Lake Worth. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
